ratings.question_text: How responsive to student comments was the instructor?
I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Apart from how well the course was taught, how valuable is the course to students with interests similar to yours?
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-10, if you wish
comments: Nothing toshow..
The use of actual risk assessments rather than textbook examples
I understand what is risk assessment and how risk assessment works.

narratives.question_text: The things about this course most in need of improvement are:
comments: The instructor often use very long sentences which are hard to understand.
Some sort of concise guidebook or text to refer to throughout the course.
Make more illustrative examples like what is asking in the exams.

narratives.question_text: What was the availability and quality of help you received of the instructor and TA?
comments: Very available for help, and always helpful
The instructor is helpful in answering questions.

narratives.question_text: Discuss if you wish how this course fits into your overall program.
comments: The course puts into context the work I do researching carcinogenic compounds in the environment
The course is somewhat but not too much relate to my field of study.

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: General interest and background for some of my research
I thought the course would be interesting and have something new for me.

narratives.question_text: Did it live up to your expectations?
comments: Yes
Yes.

narratives.question_text: Did you get out of it what you expected?
comments: Yes
Not really. I expect to learn more than conceptual knowledge.

narratives.question_text: If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: Group work allowed something like a real risk assessment to be comprehensively evaluated. Without splitting up the work, examination of risk assessments could not have been as thorough.
The group for debate is helpful and everyone is in charge of a part.

narratives.question_text: For students taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: Keep up with the readings and definitions
It would be helpful for those interested in the environmental or public health risk assessment.
